info.name: Blended Scrollbars 2
info.description:
Improvement (I think) on my Blended Scrollbars style found here: http://userstyles.org/styles/49632/blended-scrollbars.

Makes the scrollbar blend in better with glass or transparent styles.
info.additionalInfo: You will probably need to reload your current pages for scrollbar changes to take effect.
